original_text: And the priest shall see him: and, behold, if the rising be white in the skin, and it have turned the hair white, and there be quick raw flesh in the rising;
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 피부에 흰 점이 돋고 털이 희어지고 거기 생살이 생겼으면

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall see him:
if the rising be white in the skin,
and it have turned the hair white,
and there be quick raw flesh in the rising;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 솟아난 것에 생생한 날고기가 있으면
